☊ Podcast: Supergirl TV Talk #1×09: “Blood Bonds”

05 Jan 2016
Podcasts Supergirl TV Talk

What’s up with the Kryptonians and what exactly does Maxwell Lord have up his sleeve? Frank is back from vacation to join Tim for a chat about this week’s episode. Listen and enjoy! Be sure to review us on various podcast apps, e-mail us at supergirltvtalk@gmail.com, or tweet at us @TVSupergirl. Up, up and away!
